roleset.name: call names, disparaging
roleset.note: INSULT-V NOTES: 'disparate' above is certainly a typo for 'disparage.' (from insult.01-v) INSULT-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to insult.01-v. FN classes amuse-31.1 and judgement-33.1-1. FN class cause_emotion. Framed by Katie. (from insult.01-n) INSULTING-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, insult.01. Corresponds to VNcls amuse-31.1, judgement-33. (from insulting.01-j)
